short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Halts video backgrounds via a click of the mouse, to make website less distracting. Houndidi, now you see it now you don't.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Houndini  halts looping video backgrounds on website with a click or keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+B or Command+B). This allow user to make the site they visit less distracting.

Houdini, now you see it now you don't.
